description: Thinking about making the switch from Pandas to Polars? This talk is for you. Matt Harrison, author of both Effective Pandas and Effective Polars, will compare the two libraries, highlighting Polars' unique advantages and how it addresses some of Pandas' limitations. You’ll learn how to translate your existing Pandas knowledge into Polars, taking full advantage of its speed and efficiency for more effective data processing
title: From Pandas to Polars: Upgrading Your Data Workflow
